findings.title: ST - Stop Transactions
findings.description: The contract owner can remove the swap pair from `_excludeFromLimit`, causing users to be unable to sell their tokens.

findings.title: ULTW - Unlimited Liquidity to Team Wallet
findings.description: The contract owner can transfer funds without limit to the team wallet.

findings.title: BC - Blacklisted Contracts
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop contracts from transactions.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Missing events for critical arithmetic parameters.

findings.title: L13 - Divide before Multiply Operation
findings.description: Performing divisions before multiplications may cause loss of precision.

findings.title: L14 - Uninitialized Variables in Local Scope
findings.description: Uninitialized variables found in local scope.
